# Svelte Icon Cloud A Svelte library for creating interactive 3D clouds of icons, built with TypeScript and fully compatible with SvelteKit. This is a Svelte implementation inspired by [react-icon-cloud](https://github.com/teaguestockwell/react-icon-cloud). [![NPM version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/svelte-icon-cloud.svg?style=flat)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/svelte-icon-cloud) [![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-blue.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)

## About An interactive 3D tag cloud component for Svelte that renders icons into an engaging, interactive cloud. This library is a Svelte port of the excellent [react-icon-cloud](https://github.com/teaguestockwell/react-icon-cloud) by [Teague Stockwell](https://github.com/teaguestockwell). ## Features - Create beautiful, interactive 3D clouds of icons - Seamless integration with [Simple Icons](https://simpleicons.org/) - Fully typed with TypeScript - SSR-friendly with SvelteKit - Customizable appearance and behavior - Responsive design with touch support - Loading and error states included - Lazy animation (pauses when off-screen) ## Installation ```bash npm install svelte-icon-cloud ``` ## Usage ### Basic Example ```svelte ``` ### Advanced Example ```svelte ``` ## Components ### IconCloud The main component that renders a cloud of icons from Simple Icons. #### Props | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |------|------|---------|-------------| | `iconSlugs` | `string[]` | `[]` | Array of icon slugs from Simple Icons | | `theme` | `'light' \| 'dark'` | `'light'` | Theme for the icons | | `containerProps` | `object` | `{}` | Props for the container element | | `options` | `object` | `{}` | Options for the TagCanvas | | `debug` | `boolean` | `false` | Enable debug mode | ### Cloud A lower-level component that renders a TagCanvas cloud. #### Props | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |------|------|---------|-------------| | `options` | `object` | `{}` | Options for the TagCanvas | | `containerProps` | `object` | `{}` | Props for the container element | | `canvasProps` | `object` | `{}` | Props for the canvas element | | `id` | `string` | `guid()` | Unique ID for the canvas | ## API ### Utility Functions - `fetchSimpleIcons({ slugs })`: Fetch icon data from Simple Icons - `renderSimpleIcon({ icon, bgHex, fallbackHex, minContrastRatio, size, aProps })`: Render a Simple Icon as HTML - `getSlug(name)`: Convert a name to a slug - `getSlugHexs(slugs)`: Get hex colors for slugs - `getSlugsPath(slugs)`: Get paths for slugs ## Differences from react-icon-cloud This library follows the same core principles as react-icon-cloud but is implemented specifically for Svelte. Key differences include: - Svelte component architecture instead of React - SvelteKit compatibility for SSR - Svelte-specific reactive patterns - Simplified API for Svelte developers ## Credits - [react-icon-cloud](https://github.com/teaguestockwell/react-icon-cloud) by [Teague Stockwell](https://github.com/teaguestockwell) - The original React implementation that inspired this library - [Simple Icons](https://simpleicons.org/) - The comprehensive icon collection used in this library - [TagCanvas](https://www.goat1000.com/tagcanvas.php) - The underlying canvas library that powers the 3D cloud ## License MIT Â© [Ahram-41](https://github.com/Ahram-41)
